attributes.action: Make Global Warming top of the political agenda.
attributes.background: We only have one planet! Government's need to come together to create change to help slow down the process of Climate Change. We are responsible for destroying the planet and I feel as a human being, so sad that the reasons why there is Climate Change is due to greed.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might also like to sign one of these petitions: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/231038
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/234717
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/231518
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/203317
